Posts.Content: Hi Kelli, I have mine Tuesday morning as well, the first time after the original dx. I will pray for you and send many happy thoughts your way!! Ours will both turn out great!! Carlye
Posts.Title: in need of prayer and reassurance

Posts.Content: Cyndi, Have a wonderful 4th, and have fun selling the fireworks!! I am going on vacation with my family back east for a week, as always all of you will be in my thoughts and prayers!! Carlye
Posts.Title: will be offline for awhile

Posts.Content: Hi there, Welcome this is a wonderful place!! First of all you need to remember your onc or the asst, does not really know that. They may go by stastics for a a base, but they have no idea if its going to rear its ugly head or not. There are many survivors out there that were given little time to live and they are here and healthy many years later. I think we all have to be realistic in the fact that yes it could return, but not living our lives trying to focus on that. We are all survivors and intend to stay that way!! :):) I hope you have a wonderful day!! Carlye
Posts.Title: New to Site

Posts.Content: Is she doing chemo before she does her surgery? Sounds like she is having surgery on Friday, but starting chemo tomorrow? I am confused!
Posts.Title: infilterating ductal carcinoma?

Posts.Content: I did the AC only now I am getting ready for taxol , but I too took the compazine and that is what made me sooooo sick. I went ofg that and took anzament and zofran instead and I felt much better sooner! Hope that helps, the thought of compazine still makes me queasy LOL Carlye
